mapper.select: SELECT TX_ID AS txId, ERROR_DATETIME AS errorDatetime, CALLEE_CHASU AS calleeChasu, CUSTOMER_WAIT AS customerWait, EVAL_TYPE AS evalType, CORP_CODE AS corpCode, CALLEE_TYPE AS calleeType, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, LOCATION AS location, AREA AS area, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, CALLEE_GUBUN AS calleeGubun, CALLEE_REQ_DATETIME AS calleeReqDatetime, ARRIVAL_PLAN_DATETIME AS arrivalPlanDatetime, ARRIVAL_DATETIME AS arrivalDatetime, ARRIVAL_TYPE AS arrivalType, CALLEE_REQ_ELAPSED_TIME AS calleeReqElapsedTime, CALLEE_REQ_ELAPSED_SECONDS AS calleeReqElapsedSeconds, ARRIVAL_ELAPSED_TIME AS arrivalElapsedTime, ARRIVAL_ELAPSED_SECONDS AS arrivalElapsedSeconds, REPORT_DATETIME AS reportDatetime, ERROR_CONTENT AS errorContent, DEVICE AS device, ACCEPT AS accept, REFUSE_REASON AS refuseReason FROM ATMS_SLA_70

SELECT TX_ID AS txId, ERROR_DATETIME AS errorDatetime, CALLEE_CHASU AS calleeChasu, CUSTOMER_WAIT AS customerWait, EVAL_TYPE AS evalType, CORP_CODE AS corpCode, CALLEE_TYPE AS calleeType, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, BRANCH_NAME AS branchName, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, CORNER_NAME AS cornerName, LOCATION AS location, AREA AS area, TERMINAL_NO AS terminalNo, CALLEE_GUBUN AS calleeGubun, CALLEE_REQ_DATETIME AS calleeReqDatetime, ARRIVAL_PLAN_DATETIME AS arrivalPlanDatetime, ARRIVAL_DATETIME AS arrivalDatetime, ARRIVAL_TYPE AS arrivalType, CALLEE_REQ_ELAPSED_TIME AS calleeReqElapsedTime, CALLEE_REQ_ELAPSED_SECONDS AS calleeReqElapsedSeconds, ARRIVAL_ELAPSED_TIME AS arrivalElapsedTime, ARRIVAL_ELAPSED_SECONDS AS arrivalElapsedSeconds, REPORT_DATETIME AS reportDatetime, ERROR_CONTENT AS errorContent, DEVICE AS device, ACCEPT AS accept, REFUSE_REASON AS refuseReason FROM ATMS_SLA_70 WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}, ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}, CALLEE_CHASU = #{calleeChasu}
mapper.update: DELETE FROM ATMS_SLA_70 WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}, ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}, CALLEE_CHASU = #{calleeChasu}

UPDATE ATMS_SLA_70 SET CUSTOMER_WAIT = #{customerWait}, EVAL_TYPE = #{evalType}, CORP_CODE = #{corpCode}, CALLEE_TYPE = #{calleeType}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, BRANCH_NAME = #{branchName}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, CORNER_NAME = #{cornerName}, LOCATION = #{location}, AREA = #{area}, TERMINAL_NO = #{terminalNo}, CALLEE_GUBUN = #{calleeGubun}, CALLEE_REQ_DATETIME = #{calleeReqDatetime}, ARRIVAL_PLAN_DATETIME = #{arrivalPlanDatetime}, ARRIVAL_DATETIME = #{arrivalDatetime}, ARRIVAL_TYPE = #{arrivalType}, CALLEE_REQ_ELAPSED_TIME = #{calleeReqElapsedTime}, CALLEE_REQ_ELAPSED_SECONDS = #{calleeReqElapsedSeconds}, ARRIVAL_ELAPSED_TIME = #{arrivalElapsedTime}, ARRIVAL_ELAPSED_SECONDS = #{arrivalElapsedSeconds}, REPORT_DATETIME = #{reportDatetime}, ERROR_CONTENT = #{errorContent}, DEVICE = #{device}, ACCEPT = #{accept}, REFUSE_REASON = #{refuseReason} WHERE TX_ID = #{txId}, ERROR_DATETIME = #{errorDatetime}, CALLEE_CHASU = #{calleeChasu}

INSERT INTO ATMS_SLA_70 ( TX_ID, ERROR_DATETIME, CALLEE_CHASU, CUSTOMER_WAIT, EVAL_TYPE, CORP_CODE, CALLEE_TYPE, BRANCH_CODE, BRANCH_NAME, CORNER_CODE, CORNER_NAME, LOCATION, AREA, TERMINAL_NO, CALLEE_GUBUN, CALLEE_REQ_DATETIME, ARRIVAL_PLAN_DATETIME, ARRIVAL_DATETIME, ARRIVAL_TYPE, CALLEE_REQ_ELAPSED_TIME, CALLEE_REQ_ELAPSED_SECONDS, ARRIVAL_ELAPSED_TIME, ARRIVAL_ELAPSED_SECONDS, REPORT_DATETIME, ERROR_CONTENT, DEVICE, ACCEPT, REFUSE_REASON ) VALUES ( #{txId}, #{errorDatetime}, #{calleeChasu}, #{customerWait}, #{evalType}, #{corpCode}, #{calleeType}, #{branchCode}, #{branchName}, #{cornerCode}, #{cornerName}, #{location}, #{area}, #{terminalNo}, #{calleeGubun}, #{calleeReqDatetime}, #{arrivalPlanDatetime}, #{arrivalDatetime}, #{arrivalType}, #{calleeReqElapsedTime}, #{calleeReqElapsedSeconds}, #{arrivalElapsedTime}, #{arrivalElapsedSeconds}, #{reportDatetime}, #{errorContent}, #{device}, #{accept}, #{refuseReason} )
